Package ro.ubb.olympics.repository.file

Class AbstractFileRepository<ID,​T extends BaseEntity<ID>>

java.lang.Object
ro.ubb.olympics.repository.inmemory.InMemoryRepository<ID,​T>
ro.ubb.olympics.repository.file.AbstractFileRepository<ID,​T>
Type Parameters:
ID - the type of the ID of the stored entities
T - the type of the entity to be stored
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<ID,​T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AthleteFileRepository, CompetitionFileRepository, ParticipationFileRepository, SponsorFileRepository, SponsorshipFileRepository
public abstract class AbstractFileRepository<ID,​T extends BaseEntity<ID>>
extends InMemoryRepository<ID,​T>
Abstract file repository.
